entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. Please hold while I connect you with an agent.
This better be quick. I've been on hold forever.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, my name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I want to return this VeloBand Pulse. It's not working right.
I understand. Could you please provide your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's [customer email address].
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse was purchased on [Date of Purchase - 15 days prior to call].
Yeah, so I want to return it. The heart rate monitor is all messed up.
I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the heart rate readings. I do see here that the purchase was made 15 days ago. Unfortunately, our return window for the VeloBand Pulse is 10 days.
What? Seriously? I just got it! That's ridiculous! I need my money back.

I understand your frustration. Let me clarify our return policy. The 10-day return window is in place to ensure fair use for all customers. I wish I could offer a full refund, but it's outside of that window.
So, I'm just stuck with a broken piece of equipment? That's terrible customer service.

While I can't offer a full refund due to the exceeded return window, let's explore other options. While a full refund isn't possible, I can offer store credit for the amount of the VeloBand Pulse. That would allow you to select a different product that better suits your needs. What do you think about that?
Store credit? I guess that's better than nothing. But what if I don't see anything else I want right now?

The store credit doesn't expire, so you can use it whenever you find something you like. We also get new products in regularly. While I can’t authorize a full refund as a policy exception, I hope this demonstrates our commitment to resolving your issue.
Okay, okay. Store credit it is then. How does that work?

Great! I've applied the store credit to your account. You should receive an email confirmation within the next few minutes with instructions on how to use it during checkout. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help, even if I didn't get my money back directly.
You're welcome! We appreciate your business, and please don’t hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions. Have a great day!
Okay, you too. Bye.
